about_the_game:
The Path of Ren is a challenging precision platformer with tight, expressive controls. Run, jump, climb, swing, and master orb abilities to conquer 300+ unique challenges!

Master Orb Abilities

Orb abilities are easy to learn, but difficult to master! Use them to dash, crystalize, ghostify, warp, and slow time.

Collecting an orb lets you use that ability a single time with the press or hold of a button.

Collect Journal Entries

Collect thought-provoking journal entries scattered throughout the world. While entirely optional, they may give you a different perspective about the world of Mythoria.

Conquer Timed Trials

Test your skills by replaying the levels from story mode with time and point targets. Achieve bronze, silver, and gold medals and rank on Steam Leaderboards!

Unlock Outfits and Customize Ren

Unlock outfits and customize Ren to your own preferred style!

A Story About a Wish

A boy awakens in an unfamiliar world with only a single memory - a white fox granting him a forgotten wish.

Adventure through the world of Mythoria and help the boy rediscover what he wished for.

Key Features

  • Precision platformer with tight, expressive controls.

  • Mostly linear progression with side challenges and secret areas.

  • 300+ unique platforming challenges.

  • 50 thought-provoking page journal entries to collect.

  • Timed Trials, where you can replay previous sections with time and point targets.

  • Unlock outfits and customize the player to your own style.

  • RPG elements & story (skippable if desired).

  • Assist mode to lower difficulty through customizable options.

  • Extremely challenging, but equally rewarding.

FREE DEMO (currently in development)

A FREE DEMO is currently in development and set to release in the near future. Wishlist The Path of Ren to be notified when the demo becomes available!

Other Considerations / Checklist

In addition to playing the demo, here's a short checklist to help you determine if this game fits your taste. This game isn't for everyone, and as such, we want to do our best to ensure you understand what you're getting.

If you answer YES to most of the below, we believe you'll enjoy The Path of Ren.

  • Do you enjoy games where you die a lot, learn from those deaths, and eventually prevail? (Souls-like, etc..)

  • Have you played and enjoyed other popular precision platformers? (Celeste, Super Meat Boy, Rayman, etc..)

  • Do you enjoy single-player games created by a single person / small team?

  • Do you enjoy exploring hand-crafted, pixel art environments?

  • Do you like music that's designed to help you focus? (Lo-Fi, etc..)

Add the game to your Steam wishlist to be notified on release!

If you think the game looks interesting, adding it to your Steam wishlist helps a lot! :)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+ / SteamOS 3.0 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible or integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.2+ / Vulkan
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04+ / SteamOS 3.0 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible or integrated sound card with stereo sound support
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 4.3+ / Vulkan

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Catalina (10.15)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / Apple M1 chip (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 6200 / AMD Radeon R9 M380 / Apple M1 Integrated GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible or integrated sound card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Ventura (13.3)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / Apple M1 Pro / M1 Max / M2 chip (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 560X / Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655 / Apple M1 Integrated GPU / M1 Pro / M2 Integrated
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible or integrated sound card with stereo sound support

name: The Path of Ren

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible or integrated sound card

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580

short_description: A challenging precision platformer with tight controls. Master orb abilities to conquer 300+ challenges, collect thought-provoking journal entries, and race the clock in timed trials. Dash, crystalize, ghostify, warp, and slow time as you help a boy recall a wish he was granted by a white fox.
